We're letting you live here free of charge until you finish school. It seems like you don't appreciate that at all!$u\/emote Abigail 12/<dialogue who="Abigail">Stop trying to make me feel guilty.$a#$b#I appreciate that you and Dad are helping me out, but expecting me to dress the way you want is ridiculous.$a#$b#I'm not a little girl anymore, Mom.$u\/faceDirection Caroline 1/pause 1500/faceDirection Caroline 3/<dialogue who="Caroline">...You're right. I'm sorry.$s\/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/playSound woodyStep/faceDirection Abigail 2 true/faceDirection Caroline 2/<dialogue who="Abigail">Is someone there?$7\/faceDirection farmer 0/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 1 3/speed farmer 4/move farmer -4 0 2 true/move Abigail -3 0 2 false/emote Abigail 8/<dialogue who="Abigail">I swear, this house is haunted.\/emote Caroline 40/pause 500/<dialogue who="Abigail">Urgghh...$a#$b#Sorry... Don't tell everyone in town that I'm doing dance aerobics, okay?#$r -1 20 event_aerobics1#I won't tell.#$r -1 -50 event_aerobics2#I can't promise that.\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Harvey">Wow, that was quite a workout...\" 3102768/j 15/H: "playful/6 21/farmer 6 29 0 Pierre 4 17 2 Gus 9 26 1 Marnie 3 23 0 Jodi 11 20 0 Demetrius 9 17 3 Morris -100 -100 0/broadcastEvent/skippable/move farmer 0 -5 0/move Gus 0 1 1 true/move Jodi -1 0 0 true/move farmer 0 -5 0 false/pause 500/move Pierre 1 0 2/<dialogue who="Pierre">Welcome To Pierre's! To lose your loyal customers like that.#$b#But can you blame them? Joja Corporation is clearly the superior choice.$h#$b#Soon the whole town will realize that.\/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Pierre 28/playSound dwop/faceDirection Morris 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Morris 2/move Morris 0 10 2 true/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/<dialogue who="Pierre">Sigh...$s\" 963113/n pierreQualityCrops: "distantBanjo/5 19/farmer 5 23 0 Pierre 5 17 2 Gus 5 19 0 Jodi 5 21 0 Marnie 10 20 0 Robin 2 24 3 Evelyn 9 26 1/hostMail MSB_Pierre/skippable/pause 3000/<dialogue who="Pierre">Gus, I have just the thing for you...\/<dialogue who="Gus">I'm all ears.\/<dialogue who="Pierre">It's a bundle of locally sourced, organic, heirloom veggies...#$b#These are hand picked and sorted, to ensure only the very finest in quality and taste.#$b#This is a once-in-a-lifetime kind of offer!\/<dialogue who="Gus">That sounds pretty good! I could use some quality veggies for the saloon. How much does it cost?\/jump Pierre/pause 800/<dialogue who="Pierre">ONLY... *mumble* mumble*\/emote Gus 8/<dialogue who="Gus">What was that?#$b#Hahaha... for a moment there, I thought I heard, '25,000g'.$h\/emote Pierre 40/<dialogue who="Pierre">Heh... that's right. It really is a bargain, isn't it?\/jump Gus/shake Gus 1000/pause 1000/<dialogue who="Gus">Pierre, are you crazy? There's no way I could afford that. I'd have to sell the saloon!$3\/advancedMove Gus false 3 0 4 9999/move Jodi 0 -2 0 true/move farmer 0 -2 0 false/<dialogue who="Jodi">I overheard the price... that's outrageous! You should be ashamed.$3\/move Jodi 1 0 1/<dialogue who="Pierre">Wait! How about 10,000g then!?$4\/<dialogue who="Jodi">No way!\/move Jodi 1 0 1/faceDirection Gus 3/pause 1000/emote Pierre 28/pause 100/proceedPosition Jodi/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/<dialogue who="Pierre">It's a disaster, @... $s#$b#I thought this was a surefire business strategy.$s#$b#But it turns out, no one is willing to buy vegetables at a 10x price markup, even if I put the little 'organic' sticker on them.$s\/pause 400/quickQuestion #You win some, you lose some#You should be less greedy#I'm offended they didn't want my veggies(break)pause 300\\<dialogue who="Pierre">You're right, you can't run a business without taking some risk.\(break)emote Pierre 12\\<dialogue who="Pierre">Hey, I'm not forcing anyone to buy it! If they don't like the price, they can move on.$3\\\pause 1000\\<dialogue who="Pierre">...But, I guess you have a point. If I make all my customers angry, then pretty soon I won't have any customers at all...$s\(break)faceDirection Jodi 3\\<dialogue who="Jodi">Your veggies look great, @. It's Pierre's price that turned us away.\\\faceDirection Jodi 1\\pause 1000/emote Pierre 40/<dialogue who="Pierre">By the way, @... you look like you could really use a veggie dinner tonight.#$b#What do you say, wanna buy these back for the low, low price of 2,501g?\/emote farmer 12/end"
